amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being made available for the Alternative Uses for Tobacco, Maryland grant.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 110-290 to prohibit use of funds for the Alternative Uses of Tobacco (MD) grant.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 337 (Roll no. 811).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
